Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Excludes certain student loan discharge or forgiveness amounts from state income tax
Summary: Enacts the "Tax-free debt forgiveness act"; excludes certain student loan forgiveness amounts authorized under 20 U.S.C. Sections 1098aa, 1098bb, 1098cc, 1098dd or 1098ee from state income tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to excluding certain student loan discharge or forgiveness amounts from state income tax
